editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile–we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.
With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo’s legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Fly High & Cook Food in Sky
Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), you’ll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

editorialNotes.standard: Smash monsters, wield awesome weapons and explore an unforgettable megacity in this cyberpunk adventure from the makers of Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail.

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, it’s an experience you’ll happily lose yourself in.

ios.subtitle: Grow the biggest in the game!

editorialNotes.standard: With new mini-games and real-time multiplayer duels, this fruit-slashing sequel is a cut above.

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

ios.subtitle: Choose a Pokémon and team up!
Shoot and take over the bases!

editorialNotes.standard: Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Death’s never been funnier. Funny enough that when we die while poking a bear or wiring house lights, we’re as happy as when we live. Win or lose, these clever, cartoonish mini-games make survival an irresistible challenge.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
